backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Flight Log Manager backend, defining data types (FlightEntry, Aircraft, Entity) and CRUD operations for flights, aircraft, entities, and user profiles with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three high-confidence features related to fixing the LogFlight page, ManageAircraft page actions, and useQueries.ts mutation hooks, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering styles, utilities, hooks, components, and pages for the Flight Log Manager React app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including colors for background, foreground, sidebar, charts, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Flight Log Manager Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with authentication guards, profile setup modal, all page routes, a footer, and the Toaster notification provider.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar navigation component with links to all app sections, active-state highlighting, user profile display, and logout functionality using the shadcn Sidebar primitives.
frontend/src/components/EntityManager.ts: A reusable CRUD component for managing named entities (e.g., students, aircraft) with add, inline-edit, and delete functionality using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/FlightRecordsTab: Displays a list of flight records in a responsive table (desktop) with badge components for flight type and landing type (day/night).
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the app with a collapsible sidebar, sticky header with a sidebar trigger, and a main content area rendered via React Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Authentication screen that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error states, plus a branding/feature preview UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time users to enter their name and email, with validation and a React Query mutation to save the profile.
frontend/src/components/StatCard.tsx: A simple presentational card component that displays a statistic with a title, value, optional subtitle, and an icon with optional accent styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, dashboard stats, entities (students/aircraft/etc.), and flight entries with CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines an aviation-themed dark/light color palette using CSS custom properties with OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that computes and displays flight statistics (daily/monthly counts, aircraft utilization, recent flights) client-side from raw flight data fetched via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/FlightRecords.tsx: Flight records page with filterable table supporting month, student, and aircraft filters, plus CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LogFlight.tsx: Form page for logging a new flight entry with validation for date, student, instructor, aircraft, exercise, flight type, times, and landing details.
frontend/src/pages/ManageAircraft.tsx: React page for managing aircraft, providing forms to add aircraft, record daily day/night hours, and inline edit/delete existing aircraft entries using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ManageExercises.tsx: React page that fetches and displays training exercises using the EntityManager component for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/ManageInstructors.tsx: React page that fetches and displays the instructor roster using the EntityManager component for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/ManageStudents.tsx: React page that fetches and displays the student roster using the EntityManager component for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/NotFound.tsx: Simple 404 page component that displays a not-found message and a link back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Utility that converts an array of FlightEntry objects into a CSV file and triggers a browser download, with proper UTF-8 BOM and field escaping.
frontend/src/utils/timeUtils.ts: Collection of utility functions for parsing, formatting, and validating time/date values, including conversions between HH:MM strings, minutes, nanosecond bigint timestamps, and human-readable formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features, known issues (broken flight log for aircraft), and pending tasks for a flight logging application built on ICP/Motoko.
